mean_cn: adj.人口学的；人口统计学的
mean_en: of or relating to the study of changes that occur in large groups of people over a period of time :of or relating to demography
sentence: The demographic charts show the aging population in four of these countries.
sentence_trans: 人口统计图表显示了其中四个国家的人口老龄化情况。
word_etyma: demo人民 + graph写，记录 + ic…的 → demographic人口统计的
